name: GreenPark Sports
description:
This just in: The NBA has joined LCS in GreenPark. So now you can join all your favorite NBA teams.

MAY THE BEST FANS WIN
Lucky you. You just found the early access release of GreenPark – the vast, ever-expanding battleground for sports and esports fans. So hop in, join your favorite teams from the NBA and League of Legends, and go head-to-head in epic battles to prove you’re the Most Valuable Fan. New leagues are on the horizon. So stay close.

UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPERFAN
Create your superfan avatar and customize it by winning official team gear.

JOIN THE REAL-WORLD TEAMS YOU BLEED FOR
In the near future, GreenPark will contain arenas for other major sports leagues, allowing you to get recruited by your favorite teams and rally them to victory. In this release, you’ll find all the NBA and LCS teams. Stay tuned for big news about LaLiga and another major soccer league coming soon.

COMPETE IN EPIC BATTLES WITH REAL-TIME SPORTS DATA
Think you know your team? Prove it in game prediction battles using real-time sports data. The better your predictions in real games, the more points you put up for your team.

MEET UP WITH FRIENDS. TAUNT YOUR RIVALS.
GreenPark is a social world. In future releases you’ll be able to cheer with friends and talk smack to enemies. For now? Social interaction is kinda beta. So maybe cut us some slack?

LEVEL UP IN MINI-GAME SMACKDOWNS
Put on your mini-game face. Because GreenPark has games within games that will challenge you to dance, run, think, solve and conquer. New challenges arrive constantly.

WIN EXCLUSIVE REWARDS
In GreenPark you can win official virtual team gear to represent your favorite teams. We’re also planning exclusive rewards out there in the actual world. So yeah. Better get that W.

EXPLORE THE PARK
From eSports to basketball, with futbol on the way, there’s a vast universe of sports in here. And more to do than we can mention in an app store. Ready? It’s time to get in the game.

PLEASE NOTE: At some point in May ‘21, we’ll be resetting the GreenPark app in preparation for our official launch. You’ll keep your username (so get in and lock it down now), but only limited gear items will follow you into the launch release. We’re still in Early Access and calling on all sports fans to jump in, provide your feedback and help us build the future of fandom.
